recipes.name: Broccoli and Mushroom Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent.
Add broccoli and mushrooms, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add green bell pepper and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and lemon juice, season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Strawberry and Pomegranate Fruit Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine strawberries, pomegranate seeds, apples, and banana.
Pour orange juice over the fruit and toss gently.
Serve immediately or chilled.

recipes.name: Salmon with Citrus Glaze
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, whisk together orange juice, lemon juice, olive oil, honey, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet and brush with the citrus glaze.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve with additional glaze drizzled on top.

recipes.name: Mushroom and Spinach Omelette
instructions: Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Add mushrooms and cook until softened.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Beat eggs with salt and pepper, then pour into the pan.
Cook until eggs are set, then sprinkle with cheese.
Fold the omelette and serve hot.

recipes.name: Fruit and Yogurt Parfait
instructions: In a glass or bowl, layer yogurt, strawberries, banana, and pomegranate seeds.
Drizzle with honey.
Repeat layers if desired.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Vegetable Skewers
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Thread bell peppers, onion, zucchini, and mushrooms onto skewers.
Brush with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until vegetables are tender and slightly charred.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken slices and cook until browned.
Add onions and cook until translucent.
Add broccoli and green bell pepper, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and lemon juice, season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet and brush with the garlic lemon mixture.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken and Cabbage Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken slices and cook until browned.
Add onions and cook until translucent.
Add cabbage and yellow bell pepper, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Orange and Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine orange juice, strawberries, banana, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Salad
instructions: Grill chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce, bell peppers, and cherry tomatoes.
Add grilled chicken slices on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Toss and serve.

recipes.name: Strawberry and Spinach Smoothie
instructions: Combine strawberries, spinach, banana, orange juice, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Orange and Pomegranate Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine pomegranate seeds, orange segments, apples, and spinach.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Banana and Strawberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine banana, strawberries, orange juice, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Lemon Pepper Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, combine lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper, and salt.
Place chicken breasts on a baking sheet and brush with the lemon pepper mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon and Veggies
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon fillets for 5-7 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
In a separate pan, grill bell peppers and cherry tomatoes with olive oil until tender.
Serve grilled salmon with grilled vegetables and lemon slices.

recipes.name: Cabbage and Apple Slaw
instructions: In a large bowl, combine shredded cabbage and julienned apples.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the slaw and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Broccoli and Chicken Casserole
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large pan, heat olive oil and cook chicken until browned.
Add onions, broccoli, and bell pepper, cook until vegetables are tender.
In a baking dish, combine cooked chicken and vegetables with cooked rice.
Top with shredded cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Wrap
instructions: Grill chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce, bell peppers, and cherry tomatoes.
Add grilled chicken slices and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place mixture in tortillas and wrap tightly.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Orange Pomegranate Smoothie
instructions: Combine pomegranate seeds, orange juice, banana, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Vegetable Salad
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill bell peppers and cherry tomatoes with olive oil until tender.
In a large bowl, combine grilled vegetables with chopped lettuce.
Drizzle with lemon juice, olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Toss and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken and Spinach Salad
instructions: Grill chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine spinach, cherry tomatoes, and yellow bell pepper.
Add grilled chicken slices on top.
Drizzle with lemon juice, olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Toss and serve.

instructions.name: Orange and Apple Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine orange segments, apples, pomegranate seeds, and spinach.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

instructions.name: Banana and Spinach Smoothie
instructions: Combine banana, spinach, orange juice, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

instructions.name: Lemon Chicken and Potato Bake
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a baking dish, combine diced potatoes, chopped onion, and lemon slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and rosemary.
Place chicken breasts on top of the vegetables.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender.

instructions.name: Orange and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Combine orange juice, banana, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve immediately.

instructions.name: Lemon Garlic Broccoli
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a baking dish, combine broccoli florets, minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until broccoli is tender.
Serve hot.

instructions.name: Grilled Chicken and Bell Pepper Wrap
instructions: Grill chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine bell peppers and cherry tomatoes.
Add grilled chicken slices and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place mixture in tortillas and wrap tightly.
Serve immediately.

instructions.name: Pomegranate and Spinach Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine pomegranate seeds, spinach, and apples.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.
